column5: Couple shots of some "spring" steelhead, now time to bust out the Ultra light for some sucker slaying
Sheesh, blur that background please, I recognise those waves!  Nice fish porn!
wow I'd take that spot over fishing them in a ditch any day! awesome!  Cheers, Ryan
All day any day haha, their a totally different fish out in the open water... gotta love the cartwheels from 100 yards out, before you even set the hook haha
Nice man. Great fish and a sweet spot forsure! I really enjoy floating the mouths too. It is a ton of fun.  Keep it up  TDunn
